author: freedomofinfo
title: Intuitive Constantly, Evolving, and Essential App!
content: I've had Google Maps for ten years on both platforms,Android and IOS, and this is one of the most advanced AI I've EVER seen in an App! It will not only provide navigation that is able to offer more efficient routes based on traffic patterns/accidents, but it learns your routines and will always conveniently have directions with ETA to destinations waiting in your notification bar. It really works at it's best when you're integrated more into the Google Ecosystem, having Apps like Google Calendars,   Gmail, Search Bar, etc. I highly recommend downloading those applications, especially Google Calendars and Gmail, because you'll find after adding a scheduled event, whether through Calendars itself or social media, that it'll have a scheduled appointment with an ETA through Google Maps directions waiting in your notification bar along with other routinely visited locations such as Home and Work. The more of the Google Ecosystem you use the more you'll get out of the application. Additionally, while driving you can still ask Siri or Google to do something like "play music", "next track", "call ......"(anyone), or ask questions to make your drive safer and allow you to keep your hands on the wheel/eyes on the road. Great Application! I wish more people would use the voice integration more to reduce traffic and accidents from looking at and touching there phones! Last side note, most people I know download Google Maps and when using navigation confuse the icon with Apple Maps, which is just labeled just Maps. I personally have moved the Maps folder widget rather into a separate folder or off my main home screen and replaced it with Google maps so that I don't mix them up and do the same for friends who use Maps instead of Google and I ALWAYS arrive at intended destination's faster and sometimes faster by quite a bit!

author: Nashgoldwing
title: EXCELLENT.
content:
FANTASTIC, UNPRECEDENTED, POSITIVE REVIEW!

We moved into a beautiful house which my wife wished to personalize. We invested in stainless steel appliances, granite counters, new tiles in areas, all new carpeting, etc. You get the point. The top of icing was to be the PAINT JOB, inside & out. Being a registered nerd & proud of it, I researched "Painters" & interviewed several. Read reviews carefully & the choice was obvious:  AZ West Painting & owner, Chris Arevalo. Every review was overwhelmingly positive! Our experience:  fantastic crew of five. They came early & worked all day, leaving promptly at 4:30pm., giving us our house back. They "attacked" the job with energy, gentle care & yet respectfully left the kitchen, the bedroom, TV's accessible to the point we were the least bit inconvenienced under the circumstances. The care with which the furniture was moved & our sentimental delicate picture frames, paintings & artifacts handled was comforting. The paint inside & outside was excellent.
But, above all, after the work was done, Chris, the owner, walked us thro' the final inspection as though it was HIS house! Everything that we asked him to do, be it remove an inefficient mister, or land line phone plates, he did it without charge & good cheer, a nod & a smile! Chris & his crew were determined to please us, & by Jove, they DID IT!! It's obviously part of this AZ West Painting culture, & mission statement.  My wife & I are completely satisfied & grateful for the excellent work. We recommend AZ West Painting, Chris the owner & his crew: great work at a fair price!!
Nash & Hooty

author: Pearle Vision Broomfield
title: Amazing Experience
content: I wanted to thank everyone at this Pearle Vision. My experience was excellent from start to finish!!!!!  Special thank you to Dr. Alicia!!  I've gone 42 years without wearing glasses and to find out now that I need them was a little overwhelming. Dr Alicia was so thorough and took her time explaining everything to me step by step!!! She is an absolute sweetheart!!!  I also want to give a special thanks to amazing Esther for taking her time helping me find the right glasses for me.  She really knows what she is doing and found the most fabulous fit for me.  From 1 out of 10, I give them a 15!!! Thank you guys so much for all your help. I will always come back to you guys and send anyone I know!!!!!!
